item.title: BAFTA North America Launches Awards for Film, TV and Video Games (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: BAFTA North America is launching a new set of awards, the BAFTA Honours, in Los Angeles this November. The event will see three honorees, selected across film, TV and video games, receive the iconic B
